entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as a teacher who has gone to fetch Professor McGonagall. He is mentioned as being behind his desk.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is introduced as the head of Gryffindor house and described as fairer than Snape but still extremely strict. She is also mentioned as being angry on several occasions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having seen McGonagall angry before but never to this extent. He and Ron both flinch when she raises her wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is also mentioned as being present with Harry and flinching at McGonagall's raised wand. He launches into the story of their journey to Hogwarts.

relationships.description: McGonagall accompanies Snape when he returns.
Harry and Ron both flinch at McGonagall's raised wand, indicating they fear her.
Ron also shows fear of McGonagall by flinching when she raises her wand.
